question: Which institute has developed the first ICMR-approved mobile RT-PCR lab?
explanation:
The Indian Institute of Science (IISc), Bengaluru, has developed the countryâ€™s first ICMR-approved mobile RT-PCR lab.
Called the MITR (Mobile Infection Testing and Reporting) lab, it is capable of conducting 9000 tests per month. The lab than can produce 100% accurate results within four hours, has been handed over to the Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences (RGUHS).
